name: Veil Twirls
description: Master elegant and dramatic veil twirling techniques to enhance flow and expression.

cards.title: Basic Veil Twirl
cards.description: A smooth and controlled twirl to create flowing veil movements.
bulletpoints: Keep the arms extended while twirling
Maintain a relaxed grip on the veil
Use breath control to enhance fluidity

cards.title: Overhead Swirls
cards.description: A circular motion above the head for dramatic veil movement.
bulletpoints: Lift the arms and keep the veil extended
Move in a controlled circular motion
Ensure even weight distribution for a balanced effect
